Added armed version. BD Armory 0.9.0 is fun ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Performance is a bit worse

 - 20mm cannon with ammo

 - 4x AIM-120

 - 2x sidewinders

 - 4x small JDAMs

 - 2x cruise missiles

- chaff & flares

Not sure if this is a legit loadout but it seems right...

Yeah bd is the best. Awesome craft, nice work with the wings and especially the tail. It's hard to get it to be rotated forward accurately.

Only thought is that it might be a tad to large. And if you rotate the side panels just a couple more degrees they will dissapear more into the intake, making it smoother.

Otherwise perfect. Nice work.
